chinese_classical_comprehensive: `chinese_classical_comprehensive` list contains 466 classical Chinese function words compiled from Hai, W., Changhai, Z., Shan, H., Keying, W. (1996). Classical Chinese Dictionary of Function Words. Peking University Press.
chinese_classical_naive: `chinese_classical_naive` list contains 32 common classical Chinese function words harvested from https://baike.baidu.com/item/%E6%96%87%E8%A8%80%E8%99%9A%E8%AF%8D and https://zh.m.wikibooks.org/zh-hans/%E6%96%87%E8%A8%80/%E8%99%9B%E8%A9%9E.
chinese_simplified_modern: `chinese_simplified_modern` list contains 819 function words of simplified Chinese compiled from Ziqiang, W. (1998). Modern Chinese Dictionary of Function Words. Shanghai Dictionary Press.
english: `english` list contains 512 modern English function words. The list is found in from Jstylo (https://github.com/psal/jstylo/blob/master/src/main/resources/edu/drexel/psal/resources/koppel_function_words.txt).
chinese_comprehensive: `chinese_comprehensive` list contains 1,122 function words can be found in `chinese_classical_comprehensive`, `chinese_classical_naive`, and `chinese_simplified_modern`.
